Pianolibrary.org is looking for contributors.

Back to Works by composer

Johann Sebastian Bach

1685–1750

Works overview · Works by difficulty · Recommended editions

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Works are identified by the catalogue of Wolfgang Schmieder. See also works ordered by the Schmieder catalogue in the 1950 version (BWV1), the 1990 version (BWV2), the 1998 version (BWV2a) and the 2022 version (BWV3), the works in the Clavier Übung, the Notebook for Wilhelm Friedemann Bach the Notebooks for Anna Magdalena Bach, a list of arrangements and borrowings, and incipits of spurious works.
